item.description:
Sunday May 22 7pm - 2am
-Trivia @ 8pm
-Live DJ @ 10pm
-Canadian beers (including Molson Canadian draught)
-Drink specials (Caesars, Crown Royal, etc.)
-Chef Bailey's Twist on Canadian cuisine (Montreal smoked meat sandwiches, poutine, etc.)
- Prizes
- Red Sox tickets
- and much more!
item.why: The White Horse Tavern will be hosting a Victoria Day party on Sunday May 22nd at 7pm. There will be Canadian beers, drinks (Caesars!), Chef Bailey's Twist on Canadian cuisine, Trivia, DJ playing Canadian music & hits, prizes and a Red Sox giveaway.

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Victoria Day Party @ White Horse Tavern in Allston
